scripts.publish: webpack --env.host=https://c-3po-org.github.io/webpack-demo && webpack --env.locale=uk --env.host=https://c-3po-org.github.io/webpack-demo && cd dist && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update' && git checkout gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update' && git push git@github.com:c-3po-org/webpack-demo.git gh-pages --force
